changeSet.author: TakeMeTeam
changeSet.createView: SELECT child.id AS child_id, itinerary.id AS itinerary_id, child.name AS child_name, itinerary.name AS itinerary_name, string_agg( CASE WHEN ((stop_point.stop_point_type)::text = 'COLLECTION'::text) THEN concat(stop_point.scheduled_time, ';', location.*) ELSE NULL::text END, ','::text) AS collection, string_agg( CASE WHEN ((stop_point.stop_point_type)::text = 'DELIVER'::text) THEN concat(stop_point.scheduled_time, ';', location.*) ELSE NULL::text END, ','::text) AS deliver, itinerary.itinerary_status_type FROM (((((stop_point JOIN itinerary_stop_point ON ((stop_point.id = itinerary_stop_point.id_stop_point))) JOIN itinerary ON ((itinerary_stop_point.id_itinerary = itinerary.id))) JOIN stop_point_child ON ((stop_point.id = stop_point_child.stop_point_id))) JOIN child ON ((stop_point_child.child_id = child.id))) JOIN location ON ((stop_point.location_id = location.id))) GROUP BY child.id, itinerary.id, child.name, itinerary.name, itinerary.itinerary_status_type;
